intro: Asterochlaena orbicularis var. ekmanii, commonly known as the African violet. This plant is a species of flowering plant in the family Acanthaceae, characterized by its compact growth habit and showy, tubular flowers. It is native to parts of Africa and is often cultivated as a decorative plant due to its vibrant blooms. The leaves are typically rounded and glossy, providing a striking contrast to the flowers. It prefers bright, indirect light and well-draining soil to thrive.
